name: MaterialHardshipInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Material Hardship Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The terms in this value set represent the interventions associated with material hardship as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT Material Hardship interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes social determinants of health general interventions used in multiple domains)
